MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L13, L7 and L6 postcode area of Liverpool. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:42am.  Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area, however for those still without power repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex repairs required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:48am on 17th January.
